markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Abysium Powder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1407)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 96</row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This faintly glowing powder rapidly induces the symptoms of abysium poisoning.

 **Saving Throw** DC 27 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 8d6 poison damage and [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (1 minute); **Stage 2** 9d6 poison damage and sickened 2 (1 minute); **Stage 3** 10d6 poison damage and sickened 3 (1 minute)

**Craft Requirements** [abysium](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1405) worth at least 75 gp.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Abysium Powder
